description: This file defines a mock class 'CompositeInputImplMock' for unit testing, which inherits from 'device::CompositeInputImpl' and uses Google Mock to mock methods related to device input handling.

classes.name: CompositeInputImplMock
classes.description: A mock class used for testing 'device::CompositeInputImpl' functionality.

methods.name: getNumberOfInputs
methods.description: Mocks the method to return the number of inputs.

methods.name: isPortConnected
methods.description: Mocks checking whether a specific port is connected.

methods.name: selectPort
methods.description: Mocks the method to select a specific port.

methods.name: scaleVideo
methods.description: Mocks scaling video with given positional and dimensional parameters.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, scaleVideo, (int32_t x, int32_t y, int32_t width, int32_t height), (const, override))
